properties.SV_DESCRIPTION: Offers a drop-in program for youth to work on practical and developmental life skills. One-on-one counsellor support emphasizes equipping youth with the necessary skills to transition to independence. The program is designed for youth who may not be attending school, are having difficulty finding or maintaining employment, experiencing barriers that may be impacting their ability to maintain in school or home, and/or are unable to sustain independence without additional supports. Youth are also able to sign up for scheduled group workshops which encourage healthy relationship building.
